009package Ch15_ColorFilters;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.filter.nonlinear.VectorMedianFilter;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.nonlinear.VectorMedianFilter.Parameters;
017import imagingbook.common.math.VectorNorm.NormType;
018
019/**
020 * This plugin applies a vector median filter to a RGB color image.
021 * @author WB
022 * @version 2013/05/30
023 */
024public class MedianFilter_Color_Vector implements PlugInFilter {
025        
026    @Override
027        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
028         return DOES_RGB;
029    }
030
031    @Override
032        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
033        Parameters params = new VectorMedianFilter.Parameters();
034        if (!setParameters(params)) return;
035        
036        params.distanceNorm = NormType.L1;
037        params.radius = 3.0;
038
039        VectorMedianFilter filter = new VectorMedianFilter(params);
040        filter.applyTo(ip);
041        
042 //     IJ.log("Pixels modified: " + filter.modifiedCount + " of " + (ip.getPixelCount()));
043    }
044    
045    boolean setParameters(Parameters params) {
046                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Median Filter");
047                gd.addNumericField("Radius", params.radius, 1);
048                gd.addEnumChoice("Distance norm", params.distanceNorm);
049//              gd.addCheckbox("Mark modified pixels", params.markModifiedPixels);
050//              gd.addCheckbox("Show mask", params.showMask);
051                
052                gd.showDialog();
053                if(gd.wasCanceled()) return false;
054                
055                params.radius = Math.max(gd.getNextNumber(),0.5);
056                params.distanceNorm = gd.getNextEnumChoice(NormType.class);
057//              params.markModifiedPixels = gd.getNextBoolean();
058//              params.showMask = gd.getNextBoolean();
059                return true;
060    }
061}
062
